snippet: President Obama authorized sanctions on any foreign financial institution that conducts “significant transactions” in the Iranian rial, the currency of Iran.
abstract: President Obama, in latest escalation of economic pressure against Iran, authorizes sanctions on any foreign financial institution that conducts 'significant transactions' in Iranian rial; actions are seen as reaction to stalled talks over Iran's disputed nuclear program.
lead_paragraph: President Obama authorized sanctions on any foreign financial institution that conducts “significant transactions” in the Iranian rial, the currency of Iran.

headline.main: U.S. Adds to Its List of Sanctions Against Iran
headline.print_headline: U.S. Adds To Its List Of Sanctions Against Iran
